description: This file defines an Angular sidebar component with navigation links to various modules of a tourism infrastructure management system. It includes component decorator metadata, template HTML with routing and UI logic, and styles for layout and interactivity.

classes.name: SidebarComponent
classes.description: An Angular component that implements a collapsible sidebar with navigation links to different modules of the application.

methods.name: constructor
methods.description: Default constructor for the SidebarComponent, implicitly present.

methods.name: ngOnInit
methods.description: Lifecycle hook called after component initialization, not explicitly defined in this code.
